title: I Became the Demon Lord and my Territory is an Uninhabited Island - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Accelerated Growth   Age Progression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Cheats   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Clever Protagonist   Corruption   Cunning Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Demon Lord   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Early Romance   Fantasy World   First-time Interc**rse   Game Elements   Gods   Guilds   Heroes   Humanoid Protagonist   Kingdom Building   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Polygamy   Pregnancy   Prostit**es   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Religions   Reluctant Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Schemes And Conspiracies   Soldiers   Souls   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Succubus   Teachers   Wars
author: Hirunesuru Bourei   昼寝する亡霊
description:
Our protagonist Caam is a man from Earth that was reincarnated into this world as a demon. In order to survive, he spared no effort in avoiding the sparks of battle and without noticing it, he became strong himself.

Then, one day a demon that is stronger than himself suddenly appeared in front of his eyes. The demon said 「You seem quite strong. Don’t you think someone that strong should become a Demon Lord?」. He tried to negotiate but he had no right to refuse.>
